body.p: Can you give Mrs. Dickens and me, the pleasure of your company at dinner, next Friday at a quarter to Seven.
Dr.Presumably CD’s slip for “Mr.” In MS, the opening greeting’s correction of “Layard” suggests haste. Layard.|
